# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="3676e-102">Napredna Outlook.com bezbednost za Microsoft 365 pretplatnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3676e-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3676e-103">Svi korisnici Outlook.com imaju koristi od filtriranja bezvredne pošte i malvera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3676e-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3676e-104">Za Office 365 Home and Office 365 lične pretplatnike, Outlook.com izvršava dodatni pregled priloga i veza u porukama koje primate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3676e-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3676e-105">Da biste saznali više, pročitajte [naprednu Outlook.com Security za korisnike Microsoft 365](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3676e-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3676e-106">Da biste uključili ili isključili bezbedne veze, idite na [Premium bezbednosne postavke](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3676e-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="3676e-107">**Postavke** > **Premium**Premium > **bezbednosti**).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3676e-107">**Settings** > **Premium** > **Security**).</span></span>
